Uses of Package
org.jscience.mathematics.symbolic

Packages that use org.jscience.mathematics.symbolic
Package
Description
org.jscience.mathematics.symbolic
 
  • Classes in org.jscience.mathematics.symbolic used by org.jscience.mathematics.symbolic
    Class
    Description
    Expression
    Generic interface for symbolic mathematical expressions.
    FunctionExpression
    Represents a transcendental function as a symbolic expression.
    FunctionExpression.FunctionType
    Enumeration of supported function types.
    Monomial
    Represents a monomial, which is a product of variables raised to non-negative integer powers.
    PolynomialExpression
    Represents a multivariate polynomial expression.
    Series
    Represents a power series Σ aₙxⁿ.
    Variable
    Represents a symbolic variable (e.g., "x", "y", "theta").
